testcase.classname: Verify Login and sign up module with SignUp for Doctor,Chemist and Student, verify login with OTP and Password, ForgotPassword,Resend OTP,changepassword functionality and Quicklinks verification, Homepage Nonloggedin user access.
testcase.name: Verify Login with Password functionality
testcase.system-out: Given Validate the browser..................................................passed Given User should be able to click on signup icon and verify the user is on signup page.passed When User clicks on I already have an account...............................passed Then User clicks on Login with Password button..............................passed When user enters the mobile number as 8530906851 mobile number..............passed When user enters the password as Test@123 password..........................passed Then User clicks on proceed button..........................................passed Then closes the browser.....................................................passed
